timeline.bodyText: Not sure what happened here but blame Cloak
timeline.author: martmists-gh
liach

timeline.bodyText: The getters return constant values instead of these fields. In addition, getMinY does not even return the constant value of field_13221.
timeline.author: Juuxel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,4 +1,8 @@
 CLASS net/minecraft/class_2906 net/minecraft/world/gen/chunk/OverworldChunkGeneratorConfig
+	FIELD field_13221 minY I
+	FIELD field_13222 forcedBiome I
+	FIELD field_13223 riverSize I
+	FIELD field_13224 biomeSize I

replies.bodyText: so should I just undo those fields?
replies.author: martmists-gh

replies.bodyText: @liach Juuxel is right, the fields aren't used in the getters, they were inlined by javac. There's no way for sure the getters are in the same order as the fields, and there's no point in mapping them anyway.
replies.author: Runemoro

replies.bodyText: Do the fields have the same values? If they cannot identify by value (like a few private static final fields in piglin/hoglin) then i'd leave them unmapped.
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Three of them match three of the getters, but field_13221 ("minY") does not match the getMinY return value.
replies.author: Juuxel

timeline.bodyText: getMinY does not return the value of this field.
timeline.author: Juuxel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,4 +1,8 @@
 CLASS net/minecraft/class_2906 net/minecraft/world/gen/chunk/OverworldChunkGeneratorConfig
+	FIELD field_13221 minY I

replies.bodyText: @modmuss50 If martmists allows project maintainer to edit his pr, please remove this mapping entry and things are good to go.

timeline.bodyText: Both of these (and the respective getters) are 4, so it can't be known which one is which.
